entry.title: It's a weird life, but it's where i'm at right now…
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,636Chapters: 15/33Kudos: 280

Summary: Buck goes back to the 118 after the lawsuit. The team forgives him and work feels normal again. But outside the firehouse, no one invites him out. Buck feels lonely. One night he finds a new bar called the Griffin. There, he meets some new friends. Buck also learns he is going to be a dad. Or,Buck and Jess sleep together - and Jess gets pregnant. - You do not need to watch New Girl to read this. (: Daily 911 Prompts Click Here

entry.title: you could be my baby, baby, baby
entry.summary:
Author: Elgney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,131Chapters: 2/9Kudos: 240

Summary: “My mom said, uh, that his name was Buck. That he was going to go to the fire academy and that he had a—” she broke off, rubbing her own forehead, exactly where his skin went pink. “She said he went by Firehose.” Buck didn’t need all of his coworkers to look at him in alarm; he was pretty sure he’d gone deadly pale. His daughter knew four things about him, and one of them was his old tinder profile handle. He felt a little like he was going to die. “She’s got your eyes,” Eddie commented, unhelpfully. ---- Buck finds out he has a daughter, and also a stupidly big crush on his best friend. It's an adjustment.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 114,259Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 33

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,209Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 97,288Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Eastbound
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightDraft

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,163Chapters: 38/38Kudos: 13

Summary: Evan Buckley never saw it coming.Not the kiss.Not the silence that followed.And certainly not the storm that would change everything, just hours later. Eddie Díaz never saw it coming.Not the phone call.Not Christmas with his parents.And certainly not the way both would change everything. Christopher Diaz never saw it coming.His dad and Buck building a life under one roof.Buck back at the 118, doing what he was born to do.And now… the world is about to see their story.  EASTBOUND is told in three parts that together form a single complete story. Or…Buck and Eddie navigate loss, secrets, and challenges, stepping into their future together.

entry.title: I had a backbone made of glass (and then it broke)
entry.summary:
Author: paperless_paperweight

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,520Chapters: 9/11Kudos: 182

Summary: Eddie replies: Cool. Thanks. It takes three tries to hit send, his fingers too tight on the phone.Then turns off his phone like it’s radioactive. Like it might detonate from how hard his pulse is thudding in his fingertips. Tommy and Buck had hooked up again. Might be dating. Again. His grip on the beer bottle goes white-knuckled in an instant at his next thought. Did they fuck in his bed? The thought feels like a fist to the sternum. His jaw clenches so hard his teeth ache. Story is finished. +/- 10K words per chapterUpdates depending on how fast I can spell-check myself

entry.title: Any way the Wind Blows
entry.summary:
Author: guinho93

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,922Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: “You wanna talk to him?” Bobby gently asks, after noticing that Buck had his eyes fixed on something, or better, someone. “Yes” Buck lights up with the idea. “Go on.. Buck?” Bobby calls. “Yes?” Buck rapidly answers. “Don’t come on too strong.” he says. “Come home with me.” Buck blurts out. “Who are you?” the big brown deer eyes asks, looking Buck from head to toes. “The man who’s gonna marry you. I’m Buck.”

entry.title: If you feel it, chase it.
entry.summary:
Author: buckupcat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,620Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Buck runs into storms because it hurts less than standing still.Eddie studies them because control is the only thing that’s ever kept him breathing.Thrown together in the wreckage of a season that’s tearing the world apart, they clash like thunder.When the sirens wail and the winds rise, so do feelings they can’t outrun.They weren’t supposed to care.They weren’t supposed to break.But love, like the sky, doesn’t ask permission before it takes you.

entry.title: All Too Well
entry.summary:
Author: ChasetheWindTouchtheSky

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,894Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 1,383

Summary: “I-I need you do to something for me. I—” There’s a terrible wheeze and Bobby can almost see the man’s pinched face, desperately trying to smooth any indication of harm. “I need you to tell—”“No.” Bobby says strongly into the radio, his eyes never wavering from the collapsed building. He feels himself losing it – he feels the same terrible ache snake in his spine then he did that night, smoke clouding his lungs. “No, firefighter, you’re not doing this. We’re clearing debris and we’ll—”“Please?”It’s small, almost childlike.How could he ever deny a dying man’s request?-After reevaluating his career, Eddie finds himself in Texas. It’s alright, if not a boring existence. In his selfish moments, he longs for the adrenaline rush of a fire, the open air on his face. But he’s… fine. He has to be. Fine, that is. He moved for Christopher, his life in L.A. nothing more than a painful memory of what could’ve been. Eddie’s fine.When his Abuela watches the news, Eddie knows everything will change. A story about a firefighter, trapped in a building with kids. A firefighter wheezing goodbyes for those who have left him. A firefighter from the 118.Eddie is not fine.

entry.title: Nothing the Matter with a Kiss
entry.summary:
Author: fromyourfire

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,030Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 138

Summary: There are mere inches between them when he hears Eddie start to talk. “Buck, I -” Eddie’s thought is cut off by a voice behind them. “Well, well, well, don’t you two look cozy,” Buck knows that voice. He heard that voice the last time he graced this bar. He sees a scowl instantly grow on Eddie’s face, telling him he also recognizes that voice. Tommy. “Heyyy man,” Buck awkwardly says, slowly removing his hand from Eddie’s hair. OR; Tommy interrupts Buck and Eddie's night at the bar

entry.title: you are not a punching bag, my dear
entry.summary:
Author: strictlybecca

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,683Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 103

Summary: “We’ll be long distance for however long you’re gone,” Buck says reassuringly, crowding closer until Eddie’s arms are full of warm, sweet-smelling boyfriend. “You’re not getting rid of me just by going to Texas. You’d have to try a lot harder than that.” Buck’s lips are against his a moment later and Eddie sinks into the lush kiss eagerly, wanting to soak up every last bit of Buck before he folds himself down and ships himself off to El Paso to be a dutiful son. aka the one where Ramon gets sick and Eddie goes home to help.

Summary: Eddie has tried for so long to not interfere, to not tell Buck how he feels. However when Buck gets jealous of Eddie with another guy Eddie decides he doesn’t need to hold back anymore…….which leads to Buck dumping Tommy in a very interesting way. Btw….Tommy isn’t really even present other than to be dumped quickly. (And also cheated on)
